description: Dashboard for building web apps and SaaS
name: @layeredapps/dashboard

scripts.test: npm install sqlite3 --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing STORAGE=sqlite SQLITE_DATABASE=dashboard mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-sqlite: npm install sqlite3 --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing STORAGE=sqlite SQLITE_DATABASE=dashboard SQLITE_FILE=`pwd`/db.sqlite mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-sqlite-node-cache: npm install sqlite3 --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=sqlite SQLITE_DATABASE=dashboard SQLITE_FILE=`pwd`/db.sqlite mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-sqlite-redis-cache: npm install sqlite3 redis --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=redis STORAGE=sqlite SQLITE_DATABASE=dashboard SQLITE_FILE=`pwd`/db.sqlite mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-postgresql: npm install pg pg-hstore --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=error STORAGE=postgresql POSTGRESQL_DATABASE_URL=postgres:user:password@127.0.0.1:5432/postgres mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-postgresql-node-cache: npm install pg pg-hstore --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=postgresql POSTGRESQL_DATABASE_URL=postgres:user:password@127.0.0.1:5432/postgres mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-postgresql-redis-cache: npm install pg pg-hstore redis --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=redis STORAGE=postgresql POSTGRESQL_DATABASE_URL=postgres:user:password@127.0.0.1:5432/postgres mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-mariadb: npm install mysql2 --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=error STORAGE=mariadb MARIADB_HOST=localhost MARIADB_PORT=3306 MARIADB_PASSWORD=password MARIADB_DATABASE=testdb MARIADB_USERNAME=user mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-mariadb-node-cache: npm install mysql2 --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=mariadb MARIADB_HOST=localhost MARIADB_PORT=3306 MARIADB_PASSWORD=password MARIADB_DATABASE=testdb MARIADB_USERNAME=user mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-mariadb-redis-cache: npm install mysql2 redis --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=redis STORAGE=mariadb MARIADB_HOST=localhost MARIADB_PORT=3306 MARIADB_PASSWORD=password MARIADB_DATABASE=testdb MARIADB_USERNAME=user mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-mysql: npm install mysql2 --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=error STORAGE=mysql MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 MYSQL_PASSWORD=password MYSQL_DATABASE=testdb MYSQL_USERNAME=user mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-mysql-node-cache: npm install mysql2 --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=mysql MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 MYSQL_PASSWORD=password MYSQL_DATABASE=testdb MYSQL_USERNAME=user mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-mysql-redis-cache: npm install mysql2 redis --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=redis STORAGE=mysql MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 MYSQL_PASSWORD=password MYSQL_DATABASE=testdb MYSQL_USERNAME=user mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-db2: npm install ibm_db --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=error STORAGE=db2 DB2_HOST=localhost DB2_DATABASE=testdb DB2_USERNAME=db2inst1 DB2_PASSWORD=password DB2_PORT=50000 mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-db2-node-cache: npm install ibm_db --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=db2 DB2_HOST=localhost DB2_DATABASE=testdb DB2_USERNAME=db2inst1 DB2_PASSWORD=password DB2_PORT=50000 mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-db2-redis-cache: npm install ibm_db redis --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=redis STORAGE=db2 DB2_HOST=localhost DB2_DATABASE=testdb DB2_USERNAME=db2inst1 DB2_PASSWORD=password DB2_PORT=50000 mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-mssql: npm install tedious --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=error STORAGE=mssql MSSQL_HOST=localhost MSSQL_DATABASE=tempdb MSSQL_USERNAME=sa MSSQL_PASSWORD=yourStrong\(\!\)Password MSSQL_PORT=1433 mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-mssql-node-cache: npm install tedious --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=mssql MSSQL_HOST=localhost MSSQL_DATABASE=tempdb MSSQL_USERNAME=sa MSSQL_PASSWORD=yourStrong\(\!\)Password MSSQL_PORT=1433 mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
scripts.test-mssql-redis-cache: npm install tedious redis --no-save && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=redis STORAGE=mssql MSSQL_HOST=localhost MSSQL_DATABASE=tempdb MSSQL_USERNAME=sa MSSQL_PASSWORD=yourStrong\(\!\)Password MSSQL_PORT=1433 mocha src --timeout 90000 --recursive
